TopicTitle: Mk1 Peregrine, EVA Disable Due to Obstacle

Articles.Content: Does anyone else feel the MK1 inline cockpit, Peregrine, is too sensitive for obstacles disabling EVA? I find it difficult to use while still being able to get Kerbals out, because anything placed either side of it seems to block exit, even far down on its sides. Be it fuel tanks, wings, ext. All of them placed lower than where the kerbal normally pops out. It would be nice if it was a little more forgiving. I've even had trouble where I build a design, test that a kerbal can exit, but when loading the same craft at a later time, exit is suddenly disabled with all parts in the same placement.
